instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 2013 15" macbook pro "a", "1", "delete" key randomly not working
threads.message:
2013 15" macbook pro "a", "1", "delete" key randomly not working

So i have not been on in a while so i do not know if this got covered. Laptop randomly does not let the three keys work A,1,DELETE. Then they magically start working again. Sometimes it seems to be tied to the sleep function. Other times it does not. Happens frequently. Trying to diagnose if just a bad keyboard or something else. Anyone have any ideas where to start?
